parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID. You can call the DescribeDBInstances operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: ExpiredTime
parameters.description: The expiration time of the permissions. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: Privileges
parameters.description:
The permissions that you want to grant to the service account. Valid values:

*   **Control**: the configuration permissions, which allow you to view and modify configurations of the instance.
*   **Data**: the data permissions, which allow you to view schemas, indexes, and SQL statements of the instance.
